title: What is the Singstar PS3 interface font
content:
Hi this is my first post! Anyway does anyone know what this font is? (The big white titles at the top)  
Here are some screen grabs:

[http://www.singstargame.com/upload/images/whatissingstar/SingStar\_Store\_...](http://web.archive.org/web/20101224182924/http:/www.singstargame.com/upload/images/whatissingstar/SingStar_Store_2.jpg "http://www.singstargame.com/upload/images/whatissingstar/SingStar\_Store\_2.jpg")  
 [http://playthree.co.uk/wp-content/gallery/upcoming-ps3-games/SingStar1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20101224182924/http:/playthree.co.uk/wp-content/gallery/upcoming-ps3-games/SingStar1.jpg "http://playthree.co.uk/wp-content/gallery/upcoming-ps3-games/SingStar1.jpg")
author: typeman

comments.content:
Chalet Paris 1960 to be exact.
